original_text: He opened the scroll so that I could see inside it. I saw words that were written on both sides of the scroll. There were sad funeral songs, and words about great trouble that make you weep.
korean_text: 그가 그것을 내 앞에 펴시니 그 안팎에 글이 있는데 그 위에 애가와 애곡과 재앙의 말이 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: so that I could see inside it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 그 안을 볼 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: I saw words that were written
on both sides of the scroll

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 고통에 대한 말씀들이 있었다
